description: Put all dirty bath towels, beach towels, hand towels, and washcloths in a pile in the laundry room.
Empty the refrigerator of any perishable items.
Take out all trash. The trash shoot is located in the hallway behind the elevators - the yellow door to the left.
Clean all dishes you used and put them in the drying rack before leaving.
Turn the thermostat up to 28°C – help us conserve energy while the unit is unoccupied.
Ensure you have all your personal belongings.
Ensure balcony sliding doors are locked before exiting the home.
If anything got damaged during your stay, please let us know so we can correct it for the next guest.
